mapper.select: select c.id, c.calendar_id, c.status, c.dtstart, c.creator_member_id, c.dtend, c.power, c.summary, c.location, c.description, c.start_time, c.end_time, c.full_day, c.alarm_type, c.alarm_times, c.repeat_status, c.repeat_type, c.repeat_interval, c.repeat_until, c.repeat_byday, c.repeat_bymonth, c.repeat_bymonthday FROM cms_component_attend a LEFT JOIN cms_component c ON a.component_id = c.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.attend_calendar_id = #{calendar} AND ((c.start_time <= #{start} AND c.end_time >= #{start}) OR (c.start_time <= #{end} AND c.end_time >= #{end}) OR (c.start_time >= #{start} AND c.end_time <= #{end}))

SELECT c.id, c.calendar_id, c.status, c.dtstart, c.dtend, c.power, c.summary, c.location, c.creator_member_id, c.description, c.start_time, c.end_time, c.full_day, c.alarm_type, c.alarm_times, c.repeat_status, c.repeat_type, c.repeat_interval, c.repeat_until, c.repeat_byday, c.repeat_bymonth, c.repeat_bymonthday, mc.name as calendarName, mc.color FROM cms_component_attend a left join cms_component c ON a.component_id = c.id LEFT JOIN cms_member_calendar mc ON a.attend_calendar_id = mc.calendar_id WHERE a.member_id = #{memberId} AND c.summary LIKE CONCAT('%', #{word}, '%') AND mc.display = 1 ORDER BY c.start_time DESC limit #{page}, #{limit}
